text: Yakshcho vy vvazhayete tse krashche dlya syrot, vy mozhete odruzhytysya z yikhnimy materyamy - vy mozhete odruzhytysya dva, try, abo chotyry. Yakshcho vy bo lest vy stayete nespravedlyvi, todi vy budete vmist z tilʹky, abo z yakymy vamy vzhe. Dodatkovo, vy takym chynom bilʹshe pevno unyknuty finansovykh neharazdiv
